State.Author: utut
State.Description: New encounters across Act 1 and 2. Added enemies include unimplemented subclasses (Torchbearer, Bloodhunter etc) and new monsters. This mod  was originally added by Maxichigo and is no longer maintaining his mod. The goal is to create new, fix, rebalance and rework the encounters through the game.
State.Name: Additional Enemies Extended

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically use soap post-combat or when entering camp, if available in party member's inventory. Optional soap delivery to camp chest. Configurable via JSON.
State.Name: Auto Use Soap

State.Author: JonHinkerton
State.Description: Gives Volo level-based healing potions and better scroll selection as a vendor.
State.Name: Better Vendor Stock for Volo

Original.Name: DC Scaling For Coatings and Arrows-7129-1-0-1709165001.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Changes coatings, consumable arrows and throwables(grenades, barrels etc.) to use a difficulty class that scales the same way as most weapon actions do. Basically this will make it more likely for the items to successfully apply their various special effects as you progress through the game.
State.Name: Difficulty Class Scaling For Coatings Arrows And Throwables

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Another pack of 5 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 2

State.Author: Paisley Park
State.Description: Malus Thorm's Glasses reworked as Goggles for Headwear or Cloak equipment slot. Switch between over the Eyes, on the Forehead or around the Neck with included spells! SE required.
State.Name: Goggles (with Variants)

State.Author: MaskedRPGFan
State.Description: Initiative Variants. Vanilla is d4, this mod let you change it to d6, d8, d10, d12, d14, d16 or d18.
State.Name: Initiative Variants

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Tired of seeing too much of the characters' bodies during intimate scenes? Wish the "modesty leaf" covered a little bit more? This mod is for you.
State.Name: Modesty Leaf Underwear Two - New and Improved

State.Author: AureBuen
State.Description: (NOW MODULAR!) This mod adds unique eye colours to Character Creation, and adds blindness options (left eye, right eye, both eyes) to all eye colours.
State.Name: New eye colours (and blindness for all eyes)

State.Author: Gycicada
State.Description: Introduces spells from Pathfinder 2e and adapted them to 5e friendly.
State.Name: PF2e Spells

State.Author: JonHinkerton
State.Description: Removes ground glow effect from Blessing of Selune and Pixie Blessing
State.Name: Remove VFX from Shadowcurse Protection Buffs

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: The Tag Framework is an API designed to allow mods to leverage some of the behind-the-scenes tag functionality, primarilly aimed at Race (REALLY) tags, Meta Race tags, and Exclusion Tags.
State.Name: Tag Framework

State.Author: jonhinkerton
State.Description: Tired of switching to Astarion everytime you find a chest? This mod lets the active character use the highest bonus to sleight of hand in the party when picking locks, disarming traps, and picking pockets.
State.Name: Use Best Sleight of Hand

State.Author: Yves
State.Description: An expanding collection of hairs aimed at providing a diversity of styles. Usable for every gender and all races/body types.
State.Name: Yves Hair Gallery

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: Ersh
State.Description: Native open source plugin providing several camera tweaks. Unlocked camera pitch, zoom, controller stick deadzone. No separate executables. Configurable.
State.Name: Native Camera Tweaks

Original.Name: Addon for Default and Default IUI versions-4597-1-20-1708099278.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes inventories easier to read and organize. Adds new mini-icons, back and foregrounds to distinct useful loot from trash.
State.Name: Better Inventory UI (with Mark Books as Read support)

State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library is designed to be a set of common data that any mod may draw from. This includes Scripts, Spells, Statuses, Passives, etc.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Community Library

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: Adds big, long beards, only for dwarven character
State.Name: Big Dwarven Beards

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod adds a collection of new, glowing eye colors to CC, inspired by Tieflings and demonic themes.
State.Name: Demon Eyes - Eye Color Collection

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Another pack of 8 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 3

State.Author: Loktide
State.Description:
Full Release Compatible:  Changes the weight of gold to zero.  Weightless Gold.  Carry as much gold as you want.  Gold.  

Read the Warning in the Mod description before installing.
State.Name: Gold Zero Weight

State.Author: Izzli
State.Description: A collection of 6 autosnapping hairstyles, for all races and body types.
State.Name: Izzli's Snazzy Salon

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: random junk I have made for my own playthroughs
State.Name: Misc mods

State.Author: lautasantenni
State.Description: Adds two music boxes into the game, that can be used to upgrade Phalar Aluve into a +2 VeryRare and then a +3 Legendary.
State.Name: Phalar Aluve - Legendary

State.Author: REN
State.Description: Adds 9  new Hairs for females and 4 Hairs for males body types 1 and 2
State.Name: REN'S HAIR PACK 2

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: Collection of hairstyles. Mostly for elf/half-elf/drow/human/tiefling bodytypes 1&2
State.Name: Tav's Hair Salon

State.Author: PlainOldCookies
State.Description: In dialogue skill checks, use the highest modifier in your party.
State.Name: Use Highest Modifier in dialogue

Original.Name: Zhentarim Hideout trader sells inaccessible gear-3500-1-2-1698212759.7z

State.Author: PhyniX5
State.Description:
Adds gear that Larian never enabled to drop in-game proper and allows them to be purchasable at the Act 1 Zhentarim Hideout trader Brem.

Also adds gear from multiple choice rewards (Including 1 copy of each attribute Hag Hair) and much more.



Recommended for 2nd playthroughs and beyond. This mod may contain spoilers.
State.Name: Act 1 Zhentarim Hideout vendor sells inaccessible gear. Ring of Evasion and more

State.Author: Ch4nKyy
State.Description: Explore Faerûn in an immersive Third-Person-View and use WASD to move your Heroes.
State.Name: WASD Character Movement

State.Author: Aetherpoint
State.Description: Two customs utility spells that allow you to instantly kill any enemy, and destroy any object in the game
State.Name: Aether's Obliterate

State.Author: Chance Santana-Wees
State.Description:
Nexus Mods Staff edit: This mod is now the de-facto Mod Fixer for Baldur's Gate 3 and works with the Full Release.



This pak forces the story to recompile, allowing pak mods to work with the Full Release of Baldur's Gate 3.

All credit for this technique goes to Norbyte.
State.Name: Baldur's Gate 3 Mod Fixer

State.Author: Lydia
State.Description: Adds both Blaze Elin and Mizora's heads to CC for Body 1 + 3 Humans, Half-Elves, Elves/Drow, Tieflings and Body 1 Githyanki.
State.Name: Blaze Elin and Mizora Heads

State.Author: VitruvianGuar
State.Description: Reduces the number required to roll a critical hit with Adamantine Weapons by 1, thus giving a reason to forge them instead of Adamantine Armor.
State.Name: Diamondsbane - Better Adamantine Weapons

Original.Name: Encrusted With Frost Spell Save DC-7593-1-0-1709637819.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Changes the difficulty class of the freezing effect from the encrusted with frost status to scale based on your spell save DC to make it easier to freeze enemies.
State.Name: Encrusted With Frost Spell Save DC Scaling

State.Author: Aloija
State.Description: A few hairstyles for your Tav
State.Name: Hairstyles of Faerun

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: Adds some goblin and gith based mashup/undercut hairs for Tav. Works on all characters and body types
State.Name: Jerinski's Alt Hairs

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: adds more dreadlocs and curly hairstyles to CC
State.Name: more dreadlocs and curly hairstyles

State.Author: AureBuen
State.Description: (NOW MODULAR!) This mod adds unique eye colours to Character Creation, and adds blindness options (left eye, right eye, both eyes) to all eye colours.
State.Name: New eye colours (and blindness for all eyes)

Original.Name: Robes and Armor of the Absolute-4143-1-2-7-1705668413.zip

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Adds Nere's and Z'rells fancy robes and The Warden's armor to their respective loot and to the tutorial chest
State.Name: Robes and Armor of the Absolute - Nere Z'rell and The Warden

State.Author: tepkunset
State.Description: New hairs for all races/bodies.
State.Name: Tepkunset Hair Collection

State.Author: Loz
State.Description: A complete class rework/overhaul of the monk and its subclasses using LaserLlama's Alternate Monk homebrew
State.Name: Alternate Monk - Complete Class and Subclass Rework

State.Author: Sithembile
State.Description: Adds 7 new standalone faces to character creation.
State.Name: Baldurian Beauty

State.Author: TsukiTuzi-Blossom
State.Description:
♡ Update 2.0 is here ♡

Adds various new head presets
State.Name: Blossom's Presets

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for the "Burning" Effect, so that your log is not spammed by candles
State.Name: Disable combat log for Burning

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Adds desirable feats to the game, either from 5e or own creations.
State.Name: Essential Feats

State.Author: Padme4000
State.Description: This mod page is for hosting my mod that so far patches for anything that needs to be added to the races.lsx file as sadly that file is very incompatible with other mods that edit the same sections. So this makes them compatible if I got permission to add them.
State.Name: Patches for CC Mods (Races Hairs Heads Cosmetic and such)

Original.Name: more dreadlocs and curly hairstyles pack 02-6333-1-1706715112.zip

State.Author: bububull
State.Description: adds more dreadlocs and curly hairstyles to CC
State.Name: more dreadlocs and curly hairstyles Vol.02

State.Author: lautasantenni
State.Description: Adds two music boxes into the game, that can be used to upgrade Phalar Aluve into a +2 VeryRare and then a +3 Legendary.
State.Name: Phalar Aluve - Legendary

State.Author: darkcharl
State.Description:
Adds scrolls for all the 5e Spells to the game.



All credit for creating the spells and their original assets goes to DiZ91891!
State.Name: Secret Scrolls for 5e Spells

State.Author: Delran
State.Description: Buffs the underwhelming second-story work passive from the thief subclass by boosting your jumping distance based on your dexterity.
State.Name: Thief - Second-Story Work Dexterity Jump

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: Adds a toggleable ability to any character which evolves to half-Illithid.  The toggle will disable all visual effects (veins, eyes, etc) while retaining the original character visuals.  Uses SE therefore no texture replacement necessary.
State.Name: Valdacil's Half-Illithid Effect Toggle

State.Author: AlanaSP ShinyHobo Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Changes existing UI to enhance the current modding scene by removing intrusive in-game warning and enhancing character creation options. Also provides optional files that replace UI elements based on player feedback
State.Name: ImprovedUI ReleaseReady

State.Author: Loz
State.Description: A complete class rework/overhaul of the monk and its subclasses using LaserLlama's Alternate Monk homebrew
State.Name: Alternate Monk - Complete Class and Subclass Rework

State.Author: Caites and Sniffx
State.Description: Improves character sheet panel and TAB party panel.
State.Name: Better Character and Party Panels

State.Author: TsukiTuzi-Blossom
State.Description:
♡ Update 2.0 is here ♡

Adds various new head presets
State.Name: Blossom's Presets

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Crusader's Mantle, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Crusader's Mantle

State.Author: JonHinkerton
State.Description: Get the things you're missing out on by being a good person
State.Name: Evil Gear for Good Players

State.Author: labotor
State.Description: Allows for more variety in tiefling designs, essentially adds all tiefling horns (+ 12 extra and those from CustomHornsCollection) and tail options for all other races (except dragonborn). Currently doesn't add extra Tags, see mod recommendation for that.
State.Name: Half-Tiefs (Tiefling Horns and Tail for All)

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: Shadowcursed versions of my gith heads for use with Ghastly Ghouls - Playable Undead Race
State.Name: Jerinski's Masc Gith Heads - for Undead Race

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adds a few combinations of vanilla piercings
State.Name: More Piercing Combos

State.Author: darkcharl
State.Description:
Adds scrolls for all the 5e Spells to the game.



All credit for creating the spells and their original assets goes to DiZ91891!
State.Name: Secret Scrolls for 5e Spells

State.Author: Stack0pancake
State.Description: Makes the Reckless Attack Interrupt (reaction panel) prompt on a throw action. Alternate version adds unarmed strikes
State.Name: Thrown Reckless Attack fix

State.Author: StuddMuffinn
State.Description:
This mod aims at bringing both my Weapon Overhaul and Armor Overhaul mods together as well as adding a ton of unique and lore-friendly rewards. 



Almost every in game unique item got tweaks or buffs to make them either more versatile or bring them up to a similar power level with the strong/meta items in the game.



Added in  mos
State.Name: Vanilla Equipment Overhaul

State.Author: Loz
State.Description: A complete class rework/overhaul of the monk and its subclasses using LaserLlama's Alternate Monk homebrew
State.Name: Alternate Monk - Complete Class and Subclass Rework

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes combat log tighter and draggable. Auto-hide and different scale versions available.
State.Name: Better Combat Log 2

State.Author: Toarie
State.Description: random junk I have made for my own playthroughs
State.Name: Misc mods

State.Author: MegaCoolBlood
State.Description: Disables the combat log for Silvanus Blessing, so that you are not spammed with Log Notifications anymore
State.Name: Disable combat log for Silvanus Blessing

State.Author: AstralSprout
State.Description: Adds new, unlimited-use dyes to the game!
State.Name: Extra Dyes for the Fashionable Folk of Faerun

State.Author: lumad11
State.Description: Adds eight new heads to the CC for humans, elves, half-elves, drow, teifling and githyanki of body type 1
State.Name: Heads of Plenty

State.Author: PrimalFire
State.Description: Re-adjusts wet status
State.Name: Just Wet

State.Author: LightningLarryL
State.Description: There are a huge number of quips and comments for your companions in BG3 that only get used if you are playing as them. This mod repurposes all of those lines to be used as companion chatter. All lines play in the correct moment and match the situation. It really makes your party feel more alive!
State.Name: More Reactive Companions

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: A variety of piercing mashups available as new sets or replacers. Compatibility with Trips' Accessories and Magic Mirror. Includes guide for DIY.
State.Name: Piercing Edits

State.Author: serpentine_sage
State.Description: Adds 12 new piercings sets in Character Creator/Magic Mirror. (Using in game meshes, just tweaked)
State.Name: Serpentine Modifications

State.Author: perseidipity
State.Description: A patch for Toarie's "Tav's Hair Salon" mod, adding icons to the hairs! Also has patches to add compatibility with some custom race mods.
State.Name: Icon and Race Patches for Tav's Hair Salon

Original.Name: Vanilla Weapon Overhaul JWL Soul Smithing Compat-5312-1-01-1705096325.zip

State.Author: StuddMuffinn
State.Description:
This mod aims at bringing both my Weapon Overhaul and Armor Overhaul mods together as well as adding a ton of unique and lore-friendly rewards. 



Almost every in game unique item got tweaks or buffs to make them either more versatile or bring them up to a similar power level with the strong/meta items in the game.



Added in  mos
State.Name: Vanilla Equipment Overhaul

State.Author: boring3
State.Description:
Elevate the CPU Priority of the game process.

Improve overall performance and Prevent stutters caused by other processes.
State.Name: Baldur's Priority - CPU Performance FPS Optimizer

State.Author: drkekyll
State.Description: Reworks See Invisibility to reveal invisible creatures without removing their invisibility (no save). Also changes the conditions for losing invisibility to better reflect RAW.
State.Name: (See) Invisibility Rework

State.Author: Loz
State.Description: A complete class rework/overhaul of the monk and its subclasses using LaserLlama's Alternate Monk homebrew
State.Name: Alternate Monk - Complete Class and Subclass Rework

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Increases default size of container's grid available without scaling. Plus a few QoL improvements.
State.Name: Better Containers

State.Author: Hearts
State.Description: adds 51 new dyes to the tutorial chest and vendors. colours are all pretty muted. includes extremely melodramatic item descriptions for no reason other than i could :)
State.Name: Boring Dyes

State.Author: fasterdisasters
State.Description: A collection of 23 reusable new dyes and dye remover with custom icons.
State.Name: Disastrous Dyes

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adds a few glowing eye options
State.Name: Extra Eye Colors

State.Author: Hearts
State.Description: fine, no more gatekeeping. 8 new heads for bodytype 1.
State.Name: Hearts' Heads

State.Author: Jewels
State.Description: Adds re-usable items that open the combining menu. Available for other mods to take advantage of. Does nothing on its own.
State.Name: JWL Crafting Framework

State.Author: MaskedRPGFan
State.Description: Adds Soul Coins to merchants shops and tutorial chest.
State.Name: More Soul Coins

State.Author: jerinski
State.Description: A variety of piercing mashups available as new sets or replacers. Compatibility with Trips' Accessories and Magic Mirror. Includes guide for DIY.
State.Name: Piercing Edits

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of five vanilla hairstyles, but with flowers added! For all races/bodytypes!
State.Name: Short Flowery Hair

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Allows you to trade with any NPC you can talk to.
State.Name: Trade With Anyone

State.Author: Vemperen and Dufresne
State.Description:
Fixed vemperen's "Other Heads". 

Non-replacer ready!
State.Name: Vemperen's Other Heads Repaired

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Adds a 5e RAW faithful version of the Arcane Archer Fighter subclass.  This is a continuation of the work done by ShivasShadow on their original Arcane Archer mod, now revised and maintained here.
State.Name: 5e Arcane Archer - Fighter Subclasss

State.Author: KiderionLykon
State.Description:
Adds the Artificer class and all its subclasses to the game: Alchemist, Armorer, Artillerist and Battle Smith. 

Great video by Minstora showcasing the mod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k_pNEvu99ZI
State.Name: Artificer class and all subclasses

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Adds icons for contextual actions and makes widget slimmer and snappier.
State.Name: Better Context Menu

State.Author: bububull
State.Description:
adds a small collection of heads:

3 for body 1 human,elf/drow, half elf

1 for body 2 human

3 for body 1 dwarf

1 for body 1 tielfing
State.Name: Bububull's face pack 01

State.Author: Grimsyxd
State.Description: All 41 original dye icons replaced with more accurate representations of their colors after combining them with your equip

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: Adds five hairs from the game to Character Creation. For all body types.
State.Name: Extra Game Hairs

State.Author: commanderstrawberry
State.Description: Adds Helm statue's sword and shield to the game for players. Plus tabard item for all races.
State.Name: Helm's Armory - Shield and Longsword for Paladin Cleric

State.Author: Jewels
State.Description: Brings everyone's favorite box of chaos from the tabletop to Baldur's Gate!
State.Name: JWL Deck of Many Things

State.Author: bombasticmori
State.Description: My personal take on a playable Astral Elf subrace from Spelljammer. There are several others, but this one is mine! Designed with a focus on compatibility, immersion and being close to the source material.
State.Name: Mori's Astral Elves

Original.Name: Piercings with Physics - Adds new Sets-6705-1-1-2-1712680687.zip

State.Description: Adds physics to piercings, so they look animated when the character moves.

State.Author: Silver
State.Description: Adds 5 new hairstyles to CC
State.Name: Silver's Hair Pack

Original.Name: Trade With Anyone for Improved UI-2031-1-15-1710833374.zip

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Patches and merges to solve compatibility issues between various popular mods and my mods.
State.Name: Caites' Mods Compatibility Page

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: Ajax and LillyBird
State.Description: The purpose of this file to put mod configuration files in a convenient place for Listonomicon, a Wabbajack mod list.
State.Name: Listonomicon Mod Settings

State.Author: AlanaSP ShinyHobo Djmr and Zee
State.Description: Changes existing UI to enhance the current modding scene by removing intrusive in-game warning and enhancing character creation options. Also provides optional files that replace UI elements based on player feedback
State.Name: ImprovedUI ReleaseReady

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Adds a 5e RAW faithful version of one of the most underwhelming, yet nostalgic Subclasses in D&D 5e: the Banneret / Purple Dragon Knight Fighter Subclass (someone had to do it).  Fans of the Cormyrean Army rejoice!
State.Name: 5e Banneret (Purple Dragon Knight) - Fighter Subclasss

State.Author: KiderionLykon
State.Description:
Adds the Artificer class and all its subclasses to the game: Alchemist, Armorer, Artillerist and Battle Smith. 

Great video by Minstora showcasing the mod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k_pNEvu99ZI
State.Name: Artificer class and all subclasses

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Improves cursor text panel - adds damage numbers, damage type icons and warns about replacing concentration spell.
State.Name: Better Cursor Text Panel

State.Author: Kvalyr
State.Description: Adds visual notifications to tell the player when they should long rest due to camp night events and dialogues waiting to play out.
State.Name: Camp Event Notifications

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Quality of Life and Fixes - Druid is among the least played classes in Baldurs Gate 3 and 5e DnD and feels neglected. As face of the party or Tav it is especially unpleasant. This mod fixes that and much more.Re-casting spells, lockpicking, pickpocketing & more in Wild Shape, ritual Wild Shapes and many other QoL features and bug fixes.
State.Name: Druid Quality of Life

State.Author: Cerberry
State.Description: Adds 3 heads for elves, half-elves, drow, and tieflings
State.Name: Extra Heads

State.Author: horography
State.Description: Adds new standalone custom face presets for body type 1 (fem) Gnomes, Dwarves, and Halflings.
State.Name: HGY Heads for Shorties

State.Author: Jewels
State.Description: Combine your favorite equipment with Soul Coins to increase its rarity! Uses JWL Crafting Framework
State.Name: JWL Soul Smithing - Upgrade Your Gear

State.Author: Paisley Park
State.Description: Adds a Mushroom Hat as Headwear.
State.Name: Mushroom Hat

State.Author: pikuPixel
State.Description: If one character with Instrument Proficiency is Performing, all characters around them temporarily gain proficiency too. Play together!
State.Name: Play With Me

State.Author: Silver
State.Description: Adds 5 more hairstyles to character creation for body types 1 and 2.
State.Name: Silver's Hair Pack 2

State.Author: Tripsadin
State.Description: Included in this .pak modfile is my materials, textures, a localisation file and models to -add- to the BG3 Character Creation Piercing list. Piercings in Silver, Black and Gold! Also some eye stuff. Works on all races and bodytypes and genders EXCEPT Dragonborn and Half-Orc (due to thick lips). The eyewear can clip in to the cheeks.
State.Name: Trips' Accessory Collection

State.Author: Vessnelle
State.Description: new hairstyles
State.Name: Vessnelle's Hair Collection

State.Author: JupiterScreams
State.Description: Removes the ritual blood circle from the camp in Act 1 that remains after Dark Urge (redacted).
State.Name: Out Damned Spot - ritual blood circle removal

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Adds a 5e RAW faithful version of the Path of the Zealot Barbarian subclass.
State.Name: 5e Path of the Zealot - Barbarian Subclasss

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This Mod expands the colorful skintone selection by adding lighter and darker shades to Vanilla skintones, as well as a variety of new options. This version focuses on Fantasy skintones.
State.Name: Astralities' Fantasy Skintone Expansion

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Niche mod to remove entries from non installed appearance mods from the character creation menu.

 Useful if you have some all in one CC patches for modded races to declutter the menu.
State.Name: CC Cleaner

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Quality of Life and Fixes - Druid is among the least played classes in Baldurs Gate 3 and 5e DnD and feels neglected. As face of the party or Tav it is especially unpleasant. This mod fixes that and much more.Re-casting spells, lockpicking, pickpocketing & more in Wild Shape, ritual Wild Shapes and many other QoL features and bug fixes.
State.Name: Druid Quality of Life

State.Author: Aloija
State.Description: A new heads for character creation
State.Name: Faces of Faerun

State.Description: The aim of this mod is to improve the discernibility of the North on the minimap.

State.Description: Yeets intro.

State.Description: new hairstyles

State.Author: Ajax and LillyBird
State.Description: Nexus upload for wabba automation of a critical Listonomicon file.

State.Author: Shivero
State.Description:
This is a VFX Library Mod that adds 826 new VFX Files. Sorted in MEI

Ususally its a Dependency for Mods using its VFX



For now it contains 387 new Effects:

82 Different Prepare Effects

107 Different Cast Effects

90 Different Trajectories

50 Different Status Effects

33  Different Hit Effects

6 Different P
State.Name: VFX Library by Shivero

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Adds a 5e RAW faithful version of the Rune Knight Fighter subclass. This subclass was originally added to Nexus by ShivasShadow, who is no longer maintaining their mod.  I had intended to fix/update their work, but ultimately rewrote the entire mod from scratch.
State.Name: 5e Rune Knight - Fighter Subclasss

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod enables glowing eyes for races without them - Humans, Elves, Drow, Half-Elves, Half-Orcs, Halflings, Dwarves, Gnomes & Githyanki, as well as modded races.
State.Name: Astralities' Glow Eyes

State.Author: TumblingLemmings
State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.
State.Name: Better Dual Wielding

State.Author: Baltavi
State.Description:
Adds Arcana, Blood, Death, Forge, Grave, Moon, Order, Peace and Twilight Domain Clerics up to level 20. All base game Domains abilities 13-20

For abilities levels 13+ you will need a leveling mod.
State.Name: Cleric Subclasses - Release

State.Author: Aloija
State.Description: Adds 20 new dyes to vendors and tutorial chest.
State.Name: Dyes of Faerun

State.Author: NellsRelo
State.Description: A few small Compatibility-Framework based Patch mods to provide Feats every 1, 2 or 3 levels, or just an extra feat at level 2, in a way to ensures compatibility between mods. Native support for UnlockedLevelCurve, Artificer, Blood Hunter, and Mystic class mods.
State.Name: Feats Every X Levels - Compat Framework Based

State.Author: HoneyWhite
State.Description: A couple of additional (mostly female) hairstyles made using mostly vanilla assets, plus two optional hairstyles for Shadowheart.
State.Name: Honey's Hair Kitchen (WIP)

State.Author: Aetherpoint
State.Description: This mod enables the unused glowmap Larian Studios created for Karlach's horns. Making the script on her horns glow, and pulse at the same rate as her heart.
State.Name: Karlach's Glowing Horns

Original.Name: Neon's Assorted Hairs - CUSTOM RACE PATCHES-4507-1-0-1712573308.zip

State.Description: Adds a collection of new hairstyles to the character creator.

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: No "Press Any Key to continue" stop to Main menu.
State.Name: No Press Any Key Menu

Original.Name: Psychotter's Gothic Dyes - Bright  Metal Version-7329-1-1-1709668911.zip

State.Description: Makes dyeing UI faster and more convenient and dyes more recognizable in inventory.

State.Author: Sumradagnoth
State.Description: Adds a 5e RAW faithful version of the Samurai Fighter subclass. Bonnaventura brought this subclass to BG3 originally, but is no longer maintaining it. My version is a complete refresh and rewrite, but I credit Bonnaventura for their original effort and work.
State.Name: 5e Samurai - Fighter Subclasss

State.Author: Astralities
State.Description: This mod adds a variety of new hair colors to CC, including both natural and vivid tones and options for matching eyebrows & eyelashes. A continuation of my Hair Color Supplement.

State.Description: Buffs dual wielding by allowing main-hand attack to trigger off-hand attack without spending bonus actions.

State.Description: Adds a few additional cloaks/capes.

State.Name: Dynamic Sidebar

Original.Name: Feats Revised Great Weapon Master and Sharpshooter-3315-1-0-1-1697811412.zip

State.Author: VitruvianGuar
State.Description: Rescales Attack Roll Penalty/Damage Bonus for Great Weapon Master and Sharpshooter feats from - 5/10 to -4/1d12 and -4/2d6, correspondingly to better balance the feats and allow them to take advantage of Critical Hits and other bonuses.
State.Name: Feats Revised - Great Weapon Master and Sharpshooter

This is a VFX Library Mod that adds 162 new VFX Files. Sorted in MEI

Ususally its a Dependency for Mods using its VFX



Contains 73 colorful VFX's in over 162 VFX Files



29 Different Prepare Effects

11 Different Cast Effects

11 Different Trajectories

22 Different Status Effects

State.Description: This mod adds a number of unimplemented spells into the game, some of which require Norbyte's Script Extender. 6th to 9th level spells currently unavailable.

State.Author: LavenderLanner
State.Description: (( English, 日本語 )) Dye yourself to look like grandma's favourite plastic-covered antique sofa, like you've been birthed from a Sanrio store, or fill the need to relive the outfits you were forced to wear for mandatory Easter Brunch family photos after losing an argument with mom.

State.Description: The Compatibility Framework provides an API and easy JSON Configuration-based compatibility loader for other mods to use improve compatibility, however it is still too technical for some users to handle. State.Author: BG3 Community Library Team
State.Description: This is the Compatibility Framework. Split off from BG3 Community Library, this mod provides an API for other mods to use improve compatibility. Initially designed for Subclass Compatibility, the Framework has API endpoints that Script-Extender Enabled mods can hook into to insert values into Progressions, Feats, and Lists at Runtime.
State.Name: Compatibility Framework

State.Author: Charis
State.Description:
SUPPORTS 5eSPELLS AND MULTI CLASSING  

- Added level 13-20 (all classes)  

- Spells can be cast using higher spell slots (1-9)  

- Added more resources, spell slots and class features  

I needed a level extension mod and found that most other mods lacked some features or were out of date by a few patches.

State.Author: Auridh
State.Description: Adds five additional containers to the game -  for arrows, scrolls, potions, weapon coatings, grenades (and a letterbox which was already in the game). Items you pick up will automatically be added to these containers.
State.Name: Additional Autosort Containers

Original.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp 1.2.1-7035-1-2-1-1711675891.zip

State.Author: Volitio
State.Description: Automatically send read books to the camp chest or mark them as wares. Configurable with a JSON file.
State.Name: Auto Send Read Books To Camp

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes small widgets great again.
State.Name: Better Various Widgets

State.Author: wesslen
State.Description: Speeds up loading by cleaning up database entries left behind by destroyed characters (mostly summons.) Especially impactful in Honour mode.
State.Name: Database Cleaner

State.Author: EmeraldTechno
State.Description: A pack of 5 hair mashups combining vanilla hairs. For all fem body types plus human/elf/tiefling/drow masc body types.
State.Name: Em's Hair Mashups Pack 1

State.Author: Ghouls0Rules
State.Description: An assortment of custom heads made for masc and femme tavs and some bonuses.
State.Name: Ghouls Customization Compendium - Custom Heads Horns and Beards

Original.Name: Increased throw weight and range from enlarge 2x-8091-1-1-1710947016.zip

State.Author: BOZNAZ
State.Description: Makes the enlarge status increase the amount of weight you can throw and the range at which you can throw an object/creature. The multiplier stacks when stacking elixir of the colossus with other sources of enlarge. There are 3 options available for +25%, +50% and +100% multiplier.
State.Name: Increased throw weight and range from enlarge

State.Author: FallenStar
State.Description:
Make read books green, also appends a configurable prefix & suffix to read books (similar books will automatically be marked as read afterward)

Based mod, I know.
State.Name: Mark books as read

State.Author: Cyclonic
State.Description: Adds the "Perform with Party" action, allowing you to make your whole party perform with one button
State.Name: Perform with your Party

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: Rebalances feats to be more equal in power. Includes optional ASI version.
State.Name: Rebalance - Feats

State.Author: Cytraen
State.Description: Removes the need to rest between uses of tadpole/illithid dialogue options.
State.Name: Tadpole Dialogue Without Resting

State.Author: Listonomicon
State.Description: The purpose of this file is to provide an "instant" level up to 4 by the end of the tutorial, and then faster progression to level 20.
State.Name: XP_curve_LISTONOMICON_linear_slightly_faster

Original.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat-4913-1-0-0-1701871013.zip

State.Author: Syrchalis
State.Description: No modded items in the nautiloid tutorial chest. Summoned tutorial chests still contain mod items! For everyone who can't control their dark urge and gives in to temptation when seeing the tutorial chest (and for multiplayer).
State.Name: Yield to Temptation - Tutorial Chest Anti-Cheat
